timeline.bodyText:
The module name can include "." as well right?
Let's assume we have a project with 2 modules as "module_test" & "module.test", will this have an impact?
timeline.author: Dilhasha

replies.bodyText:
Yes. This certainly is a problem. Although it doesn't cause any impact to the overall functionality, it still creates unnecessary cache files when a module has '_' in its name.
I will fix this to only consider the version when replacing '_' with '.'
replies.author: Ibaqu

replies.bodyText:
I have added a function that deals with extracting the version and replacing the _ with .
This should only apply to the version and the module name will be spared.
replies.author: Ibaqu
